jalse.listeners

Class ListenerSet<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractSet<E>
        • java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArraySet<T>
          • jalse.listeners.ListenerSet<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Listener interface.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Iterable<T>, java.lang.reflect.InvocationHandler, java.util.Collection<T>, java.util.Set<T>

    public class ListenerSet<T>
extends java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArraySet<T>
implements java.lang.reflect.InvocationHandler
    Provides a thread-safe way to store and process listeners. Listener set takes in the defining listener interface and allows you to invoke the defined method upon the whole group via a getProxy().
    See Also:
    Proxy.newProxyInstance(ClassLoader, Class[], InvocationHandler), Serialized Form
